choices: The hair belonged to Inu Yasha and he had a thing for a male horse demon.
The hair belonged to Inu Yasha and he has been needing a new haroi.
It belonged to Miroku and he want's a bimbo version of Sango hungry for cock.
It belonged to Shippo and he has wanted some pocky.
11.content:
Kagome couldn't believe what she was about to do. The priestest from the future was looking down at the bubbling potion that she had concocted. All it needed was a final piece. Reaching into her back pack she pulled out a hair and dropped it into the brew. The potion color quickly changed with adition of the hair becoming purple signalling that the potion was ready for consumption.

She took a gulp of the potion, cringing in disgust as its bitter liquid made its way down her throat. Already she could feel the changes beginning and soon she would become what she wanted most. Something that would make Inu Yasha love her.
11.title: Kagome

info.brief_description: The Characters from Inuyasha go through transformations
info.description: The Characters from Inu Yasha find themself getting changed into things. Those things can range from Kagome turning into a horse or Inu Yasha finding himself as a pair of underwear for Shippo.
info.pretty_title: Inu Yasha A Feudal tf Fairy Tale
